full_summary:
**Amphibious Vehicle Tender Announcement**
### Solicitation Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure three (3) new amphibious vehicles, with an option to purchase up to five (5) additional units within 12 months. The proposed vehicles will be used for divisional needs on operational deployments and for patrolling the Canada-U.S. border.

**Key Specifications:**

* Three (3) new amphibious vehicles, 2023 model or the most recent model offered by the manufacturer
* Operating in pond-like conditions, excellent for patrolling areas inaccessible by all-terrain vehicle
* Performance specifications as outlined in the solicitation documents

**Notice Details:**

* Solicitation Number: 202202283
* Amendment Number: 5
* Publication Date: November 30, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 17, 2024, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: January 17, 2024

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to contractors eligible under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA).

**Contact Information:**
